# XMLRiver Pro Documentation

## Overview
XMLRiver Pro is a professional Python client for XMLRiver API with full coverage of Google and Yandex search capabilities.

## Key Features
- Organic search for Google and Yandex
- News, images, maps search
- Ad blocks and special blocks (OneBox, knowledge graph)
- Full type hints and modern architecture
- Comprehensive error handling
- 66 tests with 58% coverage

## Installation
```bash
# From GitHub (recommended)
pip install git+https://github.com/Eapwrk/xmlriver-pro.git

# Specific version
pip install git+https://github.com/Eapwrk/xmlriver-pro.git@v1.0.2

# Check version
python -c "import xmlriver_pro; print(xmlriver_pro.__version__)"
```

## Versioning System
- Centralized versioning with `__version__` in `__init__.py`
- Synchronized across `pyproject.toml`, `setup.py`, `__init__.py`
- `CHANGELOG.md` with full release history
- `update_version.py` script for version management
- `create_release.py` script for automated releases
- GitHub Actions for automatic releases
- GitHub Releases work out of the box, PyPI optional

## Updates
- Watch repository on GitHub for notifications
- Email: seo@controlseo.ru
- GitHub Issues and Discussions available
- Check current version: `python -c "import xmlriver_pro; print(xmlriver_pro.__version__)"`

## API Limits
- Max concurrent streams: 10 for each system (Google, Yandex, Wordstat)
- Daily limits: Google ~200k, Yandex ~150k requests
- Response time: 3-6 seconds (usually), max 60 seconds
- Recommended timeout: 60 seconds

## Error Handling
Comprehensive error handling with specific exception types:
- AuthenticationError (codes 31, 42, 45)
- RateLimitError (codes 110, 111, 115)
- NoResultsError (code 15)
- NetworkError (codes 500, 202)
- ValidationError (codes 2, 102-108, 120, 121)
- InsufficientFundsError (code 200)
- ServiceUnavailableError (codes 101, 201)

## Examples
See `examples.md` for comprehensive usage examples including:
- Basic search queries
- Advanced search with filters
- Error handling
- Mass search operations
- Position monitoring
- Competitor analysis
